verses.roman:
āmāre īśvara māne, āpanāke hīna
tāra preme vaśa āmi nā ha-i adhīna

synonyms: āmāre—Me; īśvara—the Lord; māne—regards; āpanāke—himself; hīna—low; tāra—of him; preme—by the love; vaśa—controlled; āmi—I; nā ha-i—am not; adhīna—subservient.
translation: "If one regards Me as the Supreme Lord and himself as a subordinate, I do not become subservient to his love, nor can it control Me.
